articles.description: The 23-year-old became the Reds' club-record signing after sealing an £85million switch from Benfica. The striker was a success in Portugal as he netted 26 goals in just 28 games last season.
articles.content:
Liverpool striker Darwin Nunez has been mocked on social media following his frustrating display in a 1-0 defeat to Red Bull Salzburg on Wednesday.
The Reds' £85million record signing has become a m… [+3586 chars]
